name: Moover
description:
Update - 20 minutes after the deadline

  • Fixed a mistake that prevented players from completing level 2
Welcome to Moover ! 

In this game, you goal is to guide cows back to your spaceship.

However, this planet's atmosphere is toxic for you: you have a limited time to retrieve all the cows you need ! Even worse, cows on this strange planet are really sensitive to stress: when they start panicking, they usually explode in about... 10 seconds. Good luck !

Controls:
  • Move - WASD or ZQSD
  • Pick up / Talk - E
  • Use tool - Left Mouse Button
  • Select tool - Mouse Wheel
  • Inventory - I
  • Crafting - C
  • Pause - Esc
Known Issues:
  • The goo bomb is highlly unstable, and disappears from your inventory when using other tools... Should be fixed in a following update
